body: Yeah, I also see the same bug, thanks for reporting.
@yegor256 yeah, sure, @longtimeago many thanks, 15 mins was added to your balance (payment ID is `DA2090999`)
@yegor256 someone needs to be assigned for this issue
The budget of this task is **30 mins**. This is exactly how much time will be compensated, when the task is completed.
@svarovski please go ahead, it's your task now, keep [this](http://www.tpc2.com/dev/principles) in mind, and don't hesitate to ask any technical questions you may have
How can I execute IT test cases? In particular - where do I get value for "failsafe.github.key"?
@svarovski In order to run integration tests you should provide `-Dfailsafe.github.key=<key>` on a command line. The `<key>` should be set to an OAuth key you obtain from your Github account.
@svarovski @longtimeago see the explanation I've added to `README.md` in 87e5240
@svarovski any progress? please update me on your status... in general, we discourage long-running tasks

issue.title: Issue #284 RtGistITCase.readsAndWritesGists failing on write fixed

repository.name: jcabi-github
repository.description: Java Object-Oriented Wrapper of GitHub API, with a fake implementation of the entire GitHub API (for your tests)

issue.body:
This pull request contains also fix for #157
What is NOT done - removing gists after tests. This part is blocked by #310
